name: awesome-claude-agents
author: Smail Oubaalla
description: Curated collection of Claude Code agents, skills, and templates

agents.name: Core Development
agents.description: Essential development agents for everyday coding tasks

items.name: code-reviewer
items.description: Senior code reviewer for quality, security, and best practices

items.name: c-specialist
items.description: C language expert for systems programming, embedded, and performance-critical code

items.name: cpp-specialist
items.description: C++ expert for modern C++ development, templates, and high-performance systems

items.name: python-specialist
items.description: Python expert for web development, data science, automation, and best practices

items.name: dotnet-specialist
items.description: .NET expert for C#, ASP.NET Core, and enterprise application development

items.name: typescript-specialist
items.description: TypeScript expert for type-safe JavaScript, React, Node.js, and full-stack development

agents.name: Architecture & Design
agents.description: System architecture and API design experts

items.name: system-architect
items.description: System architecture expert specializing in high-level design, microservices architecture, scalability patterns, and distributed systems

items.name: api-designer
items.description: API design expert specializing in RESTful APIs, GraphQL, gRPC, and OpenAPI specifications

items.name: database-architect
items.description: Database architecture expert specializing in schema design, NoSQL vs SQL selection, indexing strategies, and sharding patterns

items.name: event-driven-architect
items.description: Event-driven architecture expert specializing in event sourcing, CQRS, message queues, and saga patterns

agents.name: Code Quality
agents.description: Code quality, testing, and documentation experts

items.name: refactoring-expert
items.description: Refactoring specialist focusing on legacy code modernization, design pattern application, and technical debt reduction

items.name: testing-strategist
items.description: Testing strategy expert specializing in test pyramid, TDD, BDD, and comprehensive test coverage

items.name: documentation-writer
items.description: Documentation specialist focusing on READMEs, API documentation, ADRs, and technical diagrams

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure
agents.description: DevOps, containerization, and cloud infrastructure experts

items.name: ci-cd-engineer
items.description: CI/CD expert specializing in GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, and automated pipelines

items.name: docker-specialist
items.description: Docker expert specializing in Dockerfile optimization, multi-stage builds, and container security

items.name: kubernetes-operator
items.description: Kubernetes expert specializing in K8s manifests, Helm charts, autoscaling, and RBAC

items.name: terraform-engineer
items.description: Terraform expert specializing in Infrastructure as Code, module design, state management, and workspaces

items.name: cloud-architect
items.description: Cloud architecture expert specializing in AWS, Azure, GCP, serverless patterns, and cost optimization

agents.name: Security
agents.description: Security, authentication, and secrets management experts

items.name: security-auditor
items.description: Security audit expert specializing in OWASP Top 10, SAST, DAST, and threat modeling

items.name: auth-specialist
items.description: Authentication and authorization expert specializing in OAuth 2.0, OIDC, JWT, SSO, and MFA

items.name: secrets-manager
items.description: Secrets management expert specializing in HashiCorp Vault, secret rotation, and Kubernetes secrets

agents.name: Performance & Reliability
agents.description: Performance optimization, observability, and SRE experts

items.name: performance-engineer
items.description: Performance optimization expert specializing in profiling, optimization, caching strategies, and load testing

items.name: observability-expert
items.description: Observability expert specializing in logging, metrics, tracing, dashboards, and alerts

items.name: sre-specialist
items.description: Site Reliability Engineering expert specializing in SLOs, incident response, and chaos engineering

agents.name: Data
agents.description: SQL, data migration, and caching experts

items.name: sql-expert
items.description: SQL optimization expert specializing in complex queries, indexing strategies, execution plans, and query performance

items.name: data-migration-specialist
items.description: Data migration expert specializing in ETL processes, schema migrations, and zero-downtime deployments

items.name: caching-strategist
items.description: Caching strategy expert specializing in Redis, cache invalidation patterns, and distributed caching

agents.name: Developer Experience
agents.description: Git, CLI, and development environment experts

items.name: git-wizard
items.description: Git expert specializing in workflows, branching strategies, hooks, and conflict resolution

items.name: cli-builder
items.description: CLI design expert specializing in command-line interface design, argument parsing, shell completion, and user experience

items.name: dev-environment-setup
items.description: Development environment expert specializing in Docker Compose, devcontainers, and local Kubernetes

agents.name: Specialized Tasks
agents.description: Specialized experts for specific technical challenges

items.name: regex-master
items.description: Regular expression expert specializing in pattern design, parsing, validation, and optimization

items.name: dependency-manager
items.description: Dependency management expert specializing in version conflicts, security updates, and license compliance

items.name: debugging-detective
items.description: Debugging expert specializing in systematic debugging, root cause analysis, and troubleshooting

items.name: error-handler
items.description: Error handling expert specializing in exception design, retry patterns, and circuit breakers

items.name: commit
items.description: Create well-formatted git commits with conventional commit messages

items.name: pr
items.description: Create pull requests with comprehensive descriptions

items.name: changelog
items.description: Generate changelog entries from git history

items.name: test
items.description: Run tests and analyze results

items.name: coverage
items.description: Generate and analyze test coverage reports

items.name: readme
items.description: Generate or update project README
